name: AffiliatesDrive
overview:
AffiliatesDrive is a Meta Affiliate feed server that sits between online publishers and discrete merchants. Their service helps small- and medium-sized publishers manage and maximize their ad inventory, it is one of the leading affiliate tool every publisher would want to use.

Most publishers just insert AdSense code into their site layout and hope that they bring in some decent ad revenue. AffiliatesDrive wants to eliminate the complexity of finding the best affiliate network by providing an easy-to-use intermediary service that takes care of all. This is significant since there are over 200 ad networks in operation today.

All users have to do is create an account, specify ad tags, like ads colors, location, ad units, etc, and AffiliatesDrive will start going to work to finding the optimal affiliate network for your site. Publishers use Affiliates Drive ad tags for their web sites. Using the Affiliates Drive management interface, publishers can specify which merchants they want to consider when a particular ad is served. Adding an additional affiliate network does not require the publisher to change their server-side ad tags. They can simply update their ad tag parameters via the Affiliates Drive management interface and changes are reflected immediately.

How to Get Started? Itâ€™s easy for merchants to get started with Affiliates Drive. We simply need a business development contact and an engineering contact. Once you have identified those, we can typically create integration between Affiliates Drive and your merchants in a weekâ€™s time. At the end of the week, youâ€™ll have instant access to all of Affiliates Driveâ€™s publishers, who can help increase the reach of your online sales.
